soc.robot

Class SOCBuildingSpeedEstimateFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • soc.robot.SOCBuildingSpeedEstimateFactory

  • public class SOCBuildingSpeedEstimateFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory to build SOCBuildingSpeedEstimates for use by SOCRobotBrain, SOCRobotDM, etc. Also has getRollsForResourcesSorted(SOCPlayer) so that static SOCBuildingSpeedEstimate method can be called or overridden.

    This basic factory always constructs a basic SOCBuildingSpeedEstimate. Third-party bots can override as needed, along with SOCRobotBrain.createEstimatorFactory().

    Since:
    2.4.50

      SOCBuildingSpeedEstimateFactory(SOCRobotBrain brain)
      Construct a basic SOCBuildingSpeedEstimateFactory, optionally for use by brain.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SOCBuildingSpeedEstimateFactory

        public SOCBuildingSpeedEstimateFactory(SOCRobotBrain brain)
        Construct a basic SOCBuildingSpeedEstimateFactory, optionally for use by brain.
        Parameters:
        brain - Brain which will use this factory, or null. Default implementation ignores brain parameter; it's provided in case a subclass needs it.

    • Method Detail

      • getEstimator

        public SOCBuildingSpeedEstimate getEstimator(SOCPlayerNumbers numbers)
        Factory method for when a player's dice numbers are known.
        Parameters:
        numbers - the current resources in hand of the player we are estimating for, in same format passed into SOCBuildingSpeedEstimate.SOCBuildingSpeedEstimate(SOCPlayerNumbers)
        Returns:
        an estimate of time to build something, based on numbers
        See Also:
        getEstimator()

      • getEstimator

        public SOCBuildingSpeedEstimate getEstimator()
        Factory method for when a player's dice numbers are unknown or don't matter yet.
        Returns:
        an estimate of time to build something, which doesn't consider player's dice numbers yet; to do so, will need to call SOCBuildingSpeedEstimate.recalculateEstimates(SOCPlayerNumbers, int)
        See Also:
        getEstimator(SOCPlayerNumbers)

      • getRollsForResourcesSorted

        public int[] getRollsForResourcesSorted(SOCPlayer pl)
        Estimate the rolls for this player to obtain each resource. Default implementation calls SOCBuildingSpeedEstimate.getRollsForResourcesSorted(SOCPlayer, SOCBuildingSpeedEstimateFactory) which uses this factory to construct and use a SOCBuildingSpeedEstimate from pl.getNumbers().
        Parameters:
        pl - Player to check numbers
        Returns:
        Resource order, sorted by rolls per resource descending; a 5-element array containing SOCResourceConstants.CLAY, SOCResourceConstants.WHEAT, etc, where the resource type constant in [0] has the highest rolls per resource.
